data.text: @VodafoneUK That's for anyone reading this with a Moto G9 Play on vodafone who's been misled into buying a new phone due to your incorrect (it seems) scare mongering emails.

@VodafoneUK Oh as an update, turns out the Moto G9 Play as sold by you is not compatible with Wifi Calling and your guides regarding it (after recommended/security updates) are wrong on every level.
But it also turns out that your checker and "buy a new phone now!" emails are wrong too.

@Tsunahmie1 @VodafoneUK Amazing!! Wonderful to hear you managed to find a great deal with @VodafoneUK 👏
Roll on the 24th March for release!
@VodafoneUK I'm so happy when you get a chance to see you soon and I will be happy to help you with the child care center for the use of the non working number.
@VodafoneUK Yep not the result i wanted
@VodafoneUK @vodafone this is why I'll be leaving you before my renewal .. 78mb my foot .. #Vodafone #Vodafonedown https://t.co/fhqf4xCQSQ
@VodafoneUK #DreamHoliday Japan to ski down the tallest mountain...best get practising!
@VodafoneUK Im so.happy when. You can

@VodafoneUK I have 2 contacts with you I have turned off secure net but it's turned it self on one phone but I can't turn it off as it
Says it is off but its charging me for it
@JaH_HY Hey! We appreciate you reaching out. We recommend you contact @VodafoneUK via DM, they will be able to assist you with your query.
@VodafoneUK #VodafoneTreats Getting out in the sunshine and exploring the Scottish coastline has definitely put a spring in my step I feel so much more alive! https://t.co/AXrIicYnfv

@VodafoneUK #VodafoneTreats  it’s having an amazing time with my muscular dystrophy warrior! Capturing every fun and incredible moment and just taking each up and down with a pinch of salt and chocolate ice cream 🍦! The spring in our step is this one taking chocolatey steps few days ago 😍 https://t.co/gjKIJpb5ss

@VodafoneUK Horrible home broadband experience. No internet & getting same issue repeated within 2 weeks? With WFH, how one rely on your services? @SkyUK i had never faced this problem but had to switch as fiber is not available via Sky at my postcode.#broadband #CustomerService
@benjaminjmiller @VodafoneUK Same in Aberdeen

tweets.text:
@VodafoneUK Oh as an update, turns out the Moto G9 Play as sold by you is not compatible with Wifi Calling and your guides regarding it (after recommended/security updates) are wrong on every level.
But it also turns out that your checker and "buy a new phone now!" emails are wrong too.

@sparkslabs_com The Moto G9, if purchased from Vodafone though your Vodafone account should be Wi-Fi calling compatible, even after the down grading of 3G in 2023. If you are having issues with your device, please let us know and we can discuss the options.  Des

@OPPOMobileUK Just preordered this with @VodafoneUK👀
Great Deal and it will be an amazing upgrade to ny current one!
Can't wait to get a phone that actually runs google services...
And that sweet preorder bundle!

Use auto-correct to finish this sentence and we could surprise you with #VodafoneTreats

I’m so happy when…

#InternationalDayOfHappiness

Want to #WIN a Very Big Spring Getaway worth up to 10k? 🏝️

Use #DreamHoliday and our generator to tell us what you'll be doing on it.

Check out #VeryMeRewards in the My Vodafone app for the chance to win more prizes 🎁

Terms apply (ends 31/03/2022)👇

https://t.co/HpXCBf8v0Z https://t.co/NkxMV6hdDp

@VodafoneGroup customer service is the worst customer service experience you can find. 1 hour and 10 minutes on hold trying to get through & it's almost guaranteed they will lie, give me wrong information or hangup on me when I do get through 😡

🌻 March PHONEtography challenge 🌻

Share a photo from your phone of a spring adventure you’ve been on and tell us why it puts a spring in your step.

We could surprise you with #VodafoneTreats 🎁 or a brand new phone📱 https://t.co/tZ84MVXVlj

@VodafoneUK is there any particular reason why your network is getting worse in East Lothian & The Borders? Dropping calls in places I used to have no issues, barely 1 bar reception in places it used to be full with 4G etc. Its like we’ve been teleported back to the year 2000 🤦🏻‍♂️

@Hawks8920 They certainly do, Luke 😁 Due to GDPR we aren't allowed to announce who those lucky winners are, but you'll often see the winners themselves post about it on their own social media! Remember you've got to be in it, to win it! Matt

@jemmajon Hi, Jemma 👋 There was a slight issue with this reward earlier which I do apologise for, this has been fully resolved for you now. You'll now be able to proceed through the reward process and once you're at the final checkout stage it'll then be discounted accordingly 😁 Matt

@Beleza_Rach If you've been advised on a 72 hour wait, this will be from when you were given this time scale which will include weekends. If you were advised on a 3-5 working day wait, for example, then this wouldn't include weekends. Feel free to drop us a DM for further investigation. Jay https://t.co/zZC6gSR1Ak
@SophieBur492 @Virgin @O2 @EE @VodafoneUK @SophieBur492 Hi Sophie, Thanks for reaching out. I shall tag in @virginmedia so they are aware of you tweet. Thanks, VH.
@VodafoneUK I'm so happy when we have seen your last email as we are together! 🤣🤣 Typical text language I'd say! 🤣🤣🤣
I’ve been with @VodafoneUK for nearly 20 years. I have never won a prize draw on #verymerewards - has anyone ever actually won? #whatsthepoint #AskingForAFriend
@VodafoneUK It would be so much easier if you just gave me the answer :)
